data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Tunapuna/Piarco.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tunapuna/Piarco, Trinidad and Tobago
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Tunapuna/Piarco to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Tunapuna/Piarco unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Spirit, encourage the church in Tunapuna/Piarco, Trinidad and Tobago to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Arouca
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Arouca, Tunapuna/Piarco, Trinidad and Tobago.
Father, may the churches in Tunapuna/Piarco, Trinidad and Tobago honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Tunapuna/Piarco, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 50,213 believers in Tunapuna/Piarco, Trinidad and Tobago how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.
